description: Fired when a general system‐level warning occurs that isn’t tied to a specific action failure.

payloadSchema.title: Core: System Warning Occurred Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:system_warning_occurred' event, used for reporting general system‐level warnings.

message.description: Required. A user‐facing message describing the warning.

details.description: Optional. Additional technical details about the warning.

statusCode.description: Optional. Numeric code (e.g., HTTP status) associated with the warning.

url.description: Optional. URI related to the warning, if applicable.

raw.description: Optional. Raw diagnostic text or payload for debugging.

timestamp.description: Optional. ISO 8601 timestamp of when the warning occurred.
